Medicinal councels, or advices written originally in French by Dr. Theodor Turquet de Mayerne ... ; put out in Latine at Gevena by Theoph. Bonetus ; Englished by Tho. Sherley ... Mayerne, Théodore Turquet de, Sir, 1573-1655. Bonet, Théophile, 1620-1689. Sherley, Thomas, 1638-1678.
[16], 136, [7] p.
Printed for N. Ponder ..., London : 1677.
Errata is on p. 136. Includes index. Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
